synonyms: Cancer of the nasal cavity and paranasal sinuses
summary: Cancer of the nasal cavity and paranasal sinuses is rare. The paranasal sinuses are small hollow spaces around the nose lined with mucus-producing cells. The nasal cavity is the passageway behind the nose for air to reach the throat. Early symptoms may be absent, and later symptoms can resemble those of infections.
diagnosis: Lighted tube-like instruments to look inside the nose
